com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class LocationSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LocationSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener

    public class LocationSensor
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnStopListener, OnResumeListener, Deleteable
    Sensor that can provide information on longitude, latitude, and altitude.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  LocationSensor.MyLocationListener
      Class that listens for changes in location, raises appropriate events, and provides properties.

    • Field Detail

      • UNKNOWN_VALUE

        public static final int UNKNOWN_VALUE
        Constant returned by Longitude(), Latitude(), and Altitude() if no value could be obtained for them. The client can find this out directly by calling HasLongitudeLatitude() or HasAltitude().
        See Also:

        Creates a new LocationSensor component.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • LocationChanged

        public void LocationChanged(double latitude,
                            double longitude,
                            double altitude,
                            float speed)
        Indicates that a new location has been detected.

      • StatusChanged

        public void StatusChanged(java.lang.String provider,
                          java.lang.String status)
        Indicates that the status of the location provider service has changed, such as when a provider is lost or a new provider starts being used.

      • ProviderName

        public java.lang.String ProviderName()
        Indicates the source of the location information. If there is no provider, the string "NO PROVIDER" is returned. This is useful primarily for debugging.

      • ProviderName

        public void ProviderName(java.lang.String providerName)
        Change the location provider. If the blocks program changes the name, try to change the provider. Whatever happens now, the provider and the reported name may be switched to Android's preferred provider later. This is primarily for debugging.

      • ProviderLocked

        public boolean ProviderLocked()

      • ProviderLocked

        public void ProviderLocked(boolean lock)
        Indicates whether the sensor should allow the developer to manually change the provider (GPS, GSM, Wifi, etc.) from which location updates are received.

      • TimeInterval

        public void TimeInterval(int interval)

      • TimeInterval

        public int TimeInterval()

      • DistanceInterval

        public void DistanceInterval(int interval)

      • DistanceInterval

        public int DistanceInterval()

      • HasLongitudeLatitude

        public boolean HasLongitudeLatitude()
        Indicates whether longitude and latitude information is available. (It is always the case that either both or neither are.)

      • HasAltitude

        public boolean HasAltitude()
        Indicates whether altitude information is available.

      • HasAccuracy

        public boolean HasAccuracy()
        Indicates whether information about location accuracy is available.

      • Longitude

        public double Longitude()
        The most recent available longitude value. If no value is available, 0 will be returned.

      • Latitude

        public double Latitude()
        The most recently available latitude value. If no value is available, 0 will be returned.

      • Altitude

        public double Altitude()
        The most recently available altitude value, in meters. If no value is available, 0 will be returned.

      • Accuracy

        public double Accuracy()
        The most recent measure of accuracy, in meters. If no value is available, 0 will be returned.

      • Enabled

        public boolean Enabled()
        Indicates whether the user has specified that the sensor should listen for location changes and raise the corresponding events.

      • Enabled

        public void Enabled(boolean enabled)
        Indicates whether the sensor should listen for location chagnes and raise the corresponding events.

      • CurrentAddress

        public java.lang.String CurrentAddress()
        Provides a textual representation of the current address or "No address available".

      • LatitudeFromAddress

        public double LatitudeFromAddress(java.lang.String locationName)
        Derives Latitude from Address
        Parameters:
        locationName - human-readable address
        Returns:
        latitude in degrees, 0 if not found.

      • LongitudeFromAddress

        public double LongitudeFromAddress(java.lang.String locationName)
        Derives Longitude from Address
        Parameters:
        locationName - human-readable address
        Returns:
        longitude in degrees, 0 if not found.

      • AvailableProviders

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> AvailableProviders()

      • RefreshProvider

        public void RefreshProvider()
        Refresh provider attempts to choose and start the best provider unless someone has set and locked the provider. Currently, blocks programmers cannot do that because the relevant methods are not declared as properties.

      • startProvider

        private boolean startProvider(java.lang.String providerName)

      • stopListening

        private void stopListening()
        This unregisters myLocationListener as a listener to location updates. It is safe to call this even if no listener had been registered, in which case it has no effect. This also sets the value of locationProvider to null and sets listening to false.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Specified by:
        onResume in interface OnResumeListener

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Specified by:
        onStop in interface OnStopListener

      • onDelete

        public void onDelete()
        Specified by:
        onDelete in interface Deleteable

      • empty

        private boolean empty(java.lang.String s)
